resource.chars:
3. # <s>P.S.<\s>
I should not have <s>with held the com <\s> forborn so long imparting 
the <s>Use<\s> Knowledge of so usefull a Remedy to the Publick 
had not the poor people enjoined every one 
<s>secrecy who was <\s> present at ye Experiments, not to 
divulge what their remedy was, till they should 
give me leave to make it publick in these 
papers, which they have now done. The Reason 
of their keeping it a secret was the hopes of 
obtaining an <s>generous <\s> handsome Reward from generous 
& charitable people, but now having lost all 
prospect of any considerable recompense 
they were unwilling, that the means of immediate 
releif to those, who should have ye misfortune of 
being bit by an Adder, should any longer be 
<s>kept a secret <\s> withheld from them; & they are <s>as<\s>
desirous that this their <u>Remedy <\u> against the <u>bite <\u> of
